name: Kismet Tapestry
description: In this first-person, 2.5D singleplayer pixel-graphic turn based RPG set in the distant future, the player controls various members of the crew of the Federation of Frontier Colonies' Dirac Space Station, as an intergalactic conspiracy entangles its trusted captain. This game is mainly a story-rich Dungeon-crawler style RPG with cinematic cutscenes and sci-fi themes.
